title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Blended Learning Based on Discovery Learning for Enhancing Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can assess the credibility of online information with 85% accuracy
Learners can create web content (3-minute video or infographic) on social issues using digital storytelling techniques.
Learners can complete a digital project proposal within one week in a 4-member team using online collaboration tools.
Learners can improve their self-efficacy by 20% when searching for online materials before learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
